# Danilo Díaz Tarascó

> CTO & Electronic Engineer at Sento IoT+Electronics Hub, Medellín, Colombia

## About

Danilo Díaz Tarascó is a Chief Technology Officer and Electronic Engineer based in Medellín, Antioquia, Colombia. He holds Spanish nationality (EU citizen) and has 9+ years of professional experience across 4 countries (Colombia, Venezuela, USA, Canada).

He is currently CTO at Sento IoT+Electronics Hub, where he leads technical strategy, selects projects, and ensures the tech stack stays aligned with global trends. He oversees engineering teams and drives innovation for sustainable growth.

## Education

- Master's in Electronics, Mechatronics and Power Electronics — Universidad Simón Bolívar (2020–2026)
- Electronic Engineering Degree — Universidad Simón Bolívar (2010–2016)

## Professional Experience

- **CTO** — Sento IoT+Electronics Hub, Colombia (2024–Present)
- **Sr. Electronics Engineer Team Lead** — Sento IoT+Electronics Hub, Colombia (2023–2024)
- **Software Engineer** — PowDevs / Blackline Safety, USA/Canada (2021–2022)
- **Development Engineer** — Sento IoT+Electronics Hub, Colombia (2019–2021)
- **Hardware Engineer** — Innavitas SAPI - Wiot, Venezuela (2016–2019)
- **Component Specialist** — Altium, Canada (2018–2019)

## Core Expertise

- Cloud IoT / Industrial IoT (IIoT)
- Power Electronics (switching supplies, DC-DC converters)
- PCB Design & Manufacturing (Altium Designer, IPC, FCC compliance)
- Mechatronics (Fusion 360, SolidWorks, ROVs, embedded systems)
- Software Engineering (Serverless, AWS, Python, Infrastructure as Code)
- Technical Leadership (Scrum, cross-functional teams, strategic planning)

## Awards & Certifications

- 1st Place IEEE Open Category at CCSBOTS 2013
- Latin American Robotics Competition participant (Team "Giatronica")
- Mención Honorífica — ROV Telemetry System Thesis
- AWS Fundamentals: Going Cloud-Native
- AWS Fundamentals: Addressing Security Risk
- SQL Intermediate Certificate

## Languages

- Spanish (Native)
- English (Full Professional)

## Selected Projects

- Power Distribution Board for Quadcopter/Hexacopter Drones
- Switching Power Supply with TPS54331DDAR (Texas Instruments)
- ROV Telemetry System (Award-winning thesis)
- Weather Station with Freescale/NXP DemoQE128
- TCP/IP Client-Server (Python)
- Telemedicine Web Platform
